location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain Robert Taylor, Political Agent, Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: MacLeod acknowledges the receipt of his letter, with accompaniments, dated 22 March 1823, which have been despatched to Muscat by the Teignmouthcruizer. He informs Taylor that he has communicated his wishes regarding the permanent disposal of vessels in the river [Shaṭṭ al-‘Arab?] to the Senior Officer of the squadron.
